name: build-test-and-deploy-staging
on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]

jobs:

  ecr-push:
    name: ecr-push
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
    - name: Checkout	
      uses: actions/checkout@v3
      run: |
      	if [ ${{ github.event_name }} == "pull_request" &&  ${{ github.ref_name }} == "main" ]; then
	   echo "Hellooooo main" >> hello.txt
      	fi
